column4: Is there a bittorrent or metalink of Hardy out? Seems like there are less mirrors than normal
Wow, canonical is doing the metalinks now?! That is awesome

Maybe you know how to do this. I have the downthemall extension for firefox. When I click on a metalink firefox just opens it as a txt file. and if I manually add it to downthemall, it downloads the metalink, it doesn't USE the metalink
you can right click the metalink URL and select Save link w/ DTA or Start saving w/ DTA oneclick
